Test to count number of arrows a player has remaining.

Create 3x3 grid
!|PlayerArrowCount|
|width|height|
|3|3|


* Map Layout
 
{{{	  
(0,0) (1,0) (2,0)
(0,1) (1,1) (2,1)	
(0,2) (1,2) (2,2)
}}}


* Use 9 caverns
!|script|PlayerArrowCount|
|cavern|0||0|
|cavern|0||1|
|cavern|0||2|
|cavern|1||0|
|cavern|1||1|
|cavern|1||2|
|cavern|2||0|
|cavern|2||1|
|cavern|2||2|

 * Shoot 1 arrow per turn

!|script|
|put|player|in cavern|2|1|
|give|player|Arrow_Count|5|
|check|message|Available Directions are N, W, S.|was printed|true|
|check|message|Press F to Fire Arrow.|was printed|true|
|enter command|F|
|check|message|Available Directions to Fire Arrows are N, W, S. Which Direction do you want to shoot?|was printed|true|
|enter command|N|
|check|message|Arrow missed.|was printed|true|
|give|player|ArrowCount|4|
|check|message|You have 4 arrows remaining.|was printed|true|
|player|turn|ends|
